org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.base.NativeReferencePathManagerBase

type
class

org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.js.NativeReferencePathManager
This is a base class for the path manager. It retrieves and return the root of the DOM, sush as the body tag in HTML
